channel.title: Handling Cases?
channel.description:
I am trying to make a Handler for a skill I am making.
It uses Object Click for EXP, and I want that stuff inside of the Handler.
How do I handle Cases so I can do this Object Training in the Handler?

item.title: Handling Cases?
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

case ###;
        if (actionTimer == 0) {       
                addSkillXP((EXP * playerLevel[###]), ###);
                addItem(itemID, amount;
                sM("SKILLZORLUL!!.");       
                setAnimation(0x378);
                actionTimer = 0;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            }
            break;

just a small fix, donâ€™t use allstars btw.

Read full topic

item.title: Handling Cases?
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

This is it I believe-

case OBJECTID 
        if (actionTimer == 0) {	
                addSkillXP((EXP * playerLevel[STAT]), STAT);
                addItem(itemID, amount;
                sendMessage("MESSAGE.");	
                setAnimation(0x378);
                actionTimer = 15;
                updateRequired = true; 
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            }
            break;[/code]
EXPLANATION-
OBJECTID- Is the Object you are clicking on
EXP- Is how much exp you are going to get * the players level
STAT- Is that skill number you are training *THEY BOTH HAVE TO BE THE SAME*
ItemID- Is what item it is giving
amount- How much of the item it is giving
MESSAGE- If you want it to send a message put it in there otherwise delete it
Actiontimer- is how long you have to wait after you click it

====
And heres the skill ID's
[code]attack-0
defence-1
strength-2
hitpoints-3
range-4
prayer-5
magic-6
cooking-7
woodcutting-8
fletching-9
fishing-10
firemaking-11
crafting-12
smithing-13
mining-14
herblore-15
agility-16
theiving-17
slayer-18
faeming-19
runecrafting-20

Read full topic
